venue.name: Hanover Theater for the Performing Arts

item.description:
Suggested by Donna L!  A great idea!

It’s five-time, Tony Award® nominated smash-hit musical ROCK OF AGES, a hilarious, feel-good love story. In 1987 on the Sunset Strip, a small town girl met a big city rocker and in LA’s most famous rock club, they fell in love to the greatest songs of the 80’s. ROCK OF AGES, is an arena-rock love story told through the mind blowing, face-melting hits of Journey, Night Ranger, STYX, Reo Speedwagon, Pat Benatar, Twisted Sister, Poison, Asia, Whitesnake and many more. Don’t miss this awesomely good time about dreaming big, playing loud and partying on!

BosTix currently has discount tickets on sale.  I will buy all the tickets at once so that we are sitting together and we only have to pay the extra $2 per order fee once.  With this kind of show, I think it will be much more fun if we're all sitting  together That way, we can relive the glory days of our mis-spent youth...or something! Tickets are in the mid-balcony section and will cost $30 per person - this includes the BosTix fees, the MeetUp fee and any  Paypal charges. 

Show starts at 6:30, so we'll meet for an early dinner/drinks beforehand at Chipotle or Bucca de Beppo (or similar!) Or - meet us at the theater; I'll have the tickets in hand! 


NOTE: PLEASE PAY VIA PAYPAL WHEN YOU RSVP!   COST is $30 each.

I will buy the tickets on Friday afternoon.  My Paypal email is julie.chilton@yahoo.com.  If you do not pay, I cannot buy your ticket.  Please don't RSVP "YES" unless you are going to pay! 

(I know this seems like a silly thing to say...but it seems necessary.)
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet up for an early dinner beforehand...
item.name: Rock of Ages at the Hanover Theater!
